CustomField.description: This specifically shows whether or not the hours, targets, and calls are on pace or behind pace for reporting.
CustomField.formula: IF(OR( Percent_of_Logged_Hours_Goal_Complete__c < (1-Number_of_Calling_Days_Left_This_Month__c/ Number_of_Days_Total_This_Month__c) , Percent_of_Monthly_Call_Goal_Complete__c < (1-Number_of_Calling_Days_Left_This_Month__c/ Number_of_Days_Total_This_Month__c)), "Behind Pace", "On Pace")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This specifically shows whether or not the hours, targets, and calls are on pace or behind pace for reporting.
CustomField.label: Behind Pace (Calls, Hours, Targets)
